instruction.instruction_text: From your current position, first turn 90 degrees counter-clockwise, then go straight for 2.25 meters; next, turn left 90 degrees and walk 3 meters forward to exit the room; then, turn left 30 degrees and go straight for 2.75 meters; after that, turn right 30 degrees and go straight for 1.25 meters; finally, turn left 120 degrees, continue straight for another 1.25 meters, and stop at the stairs.

From your current position, go straight 4 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and continue for 1.25 meters. Next, turn left 30 degrees and go 6 meters, entering the house and passing through the hallway. After that, turn right 90 degrees and go 3.25 meters to stop in front of the tent.

From your current position, first turn half a circle counter-clockwise, then go forward 3 meters. Then turn left 90 degrees, go forward 2.25 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, and go forward 0.5 meters. Then turn half a circle clockwise, and go forward 3.5 meters. Finally, turn right 30 degrees and stop, facing the chair.

From the sink, turn right 90 degrees, walk straight 1.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and walk another 1.25 meters. Next, turn right 90 degrees and walk straight 2 meters. Stop, then spin one and a half times clockwise. After that, walk straight for 4.5 meters, then turn right and walk another 4.5 meters and stop.

From your current position, to get to the spot 3.5 meters away, 45 degrees to your front-left: first, go forward 2.5 meters, then turn left and go another 2.5 meters. After that, go straight for 4.25 meters to exit the garage, then turn right 30 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters. Finally, turn right 60 degrees, go forward 1.25 meters, and then stop.

From your current position, first turn left 90 degrees and walk 1.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees again and walk 2 meters, followed by another 90-degree left turn and walk 2.25 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and walk 3 meters, after that turn right 30 degrees and walk 1 meter, then turn right 60 degrees and walk 1.25 meters, and finally turn right 90 degrees and stop, facing the shower.

From your current position, first head to the room across, then go straight for 8.5 meters, make a 60-degree right turn, go straight for another 2.5 meters, make a 60-degree left turn, go straight for another 2 meters, and finally make a 180-degree right turn and stop.

From your current position, first head to the room across, then go straight for 8.5 meters, make a 60-degree right turn, go straight for another 2.5 meters, make a 60-degree left turn, go straight for another 2 meters, and finally make a 180-degree right turn and stop.

Starting from here, first turn right 90 degrees and go 1 meter, then turn left 90 degrees and walk 3.75 meters to stop at the dining table; after that, turn left 90 degrees and go 4 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go 2.5 meters, followed by a 30-degree left turn and a 2.25-meter walk, and finally make a 90-degree right turn to stop in front of the TV.

From your current position, walk forward 4.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and walk another 4.5 meters, which will bring you to a spot 6.3 meters front-left at a 45-degree angle; stop there, then turn around 180 degrees to your right, walk 4.75 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, walk 5 meters, and finally stop.

Starting from your current position, go forward 4.5 meters. Then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 3.75 meters. Next, turn left 30 degrees and go forward 2 meters. After that, turn left 60 degrees and go forward 1.25 meters. Finally, turn left 90 degrees, go forward 2 meters, and then stop.

From your current position, first turn left 180 degrees and go straight for 2 meters; then turn right 90 degrees and go straight for another 2 meters; after that, turn right 90 degrees again and go straight for 5.5 meters; finally, turn right 90 degrees, go straight for 4.5 meters, and stop.

From your current position, first turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 2.75 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, go forward 0.75 meters, then turn left 30 degrees again and go forward 2 meters to exit the room, then turn right 30 degrees, go forward 1.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, go forward 1 meter, and stop in front of the table.

From your current position, first turn left 60 degrees, then go 10 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go 4.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, and finally go 2.25 meters, stopping in front of the table.

From your current spot, go straight for 2.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go 1 meter. Next, turn right 30 degrees and go 5 meters to the front of the workstation. After that, turn right 60 degrees and go 2.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go 3.5 meters to stop in front of the chair.

Starting from your current position, first go straight 1 meter, then turn left 90 degrees, then turn right 60 degrees, then go straight 3.25 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, then go straight 3.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, then go straight 2.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go straight 2.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, and finally go straight 4 meters and stop in front of the cabinet.
From where you are now, go back half a meter, then turn left 150 degrees, move forward 7 meters, turn left 150 degrees again, and stop once you're facing the round table.
From your current position, go forward 13 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, go back 1 meter, and stop.

Go forward 2.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, then go forward 1 meter, then turn left 60 degrees, then go forward 2.5 meters, then turn clockwise 150 degrees, then go forward 1 meter, then turn left 90 degrees, then go forward 5.75 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and stop.

From your current position, go forward 1.25 meters, then turn right and go 1.5 meters, then turn right and go 1.25 meters, then turn right again and go 1.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 1.5 meters, then turn right 120 degrees and go 3 meters, and then stop.

Starting from here, go straight 4.5 meters up to the second floor, then turn left 90 degrees and go straight 1 meter, after that turn right 30 degrees and go straight 2.5 meters, next turn 210 degrees clockwise, then go straight another 2.5 meters and stop.
Go forward 4 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 0.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, and go another 0.5 meters before stopping.

From your current position, go forward 5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 3.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 1 meter to the second floor, then turn left 30 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, and finally go forward 1 meter and stop.

From your current position, first turn left 60 degrees, walk 3 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and walk 1.5 meters. After that, turn left 90 degrees and walk 1.75 meters into the restroom. Finally, turn right 120 degrees, walk 1 meter, and stop by the sink.

From your current position, go forward 0.75 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and go another 1.75 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 2.25 meters to exit the bathroom, followed by a right turn of 120 degrees and another 2 meters, then a right turn of 60 degrees and 1.25 meters to exit the room, stopping in the hallway.

From your current position, first go forward 6 meters to the room across the corridor, then turn left 30 degrees and go forward 1.25 meters, then turn right 120 degrees and step back 2 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 1 meter, and finally turn right 30 degrees and go forward 2 meters, stopping in front of the shower.

Starting from your current position, first go forward 2.25 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, then go forward 7 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go forward 2.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go forward 1.5 meters, and stop in front of the chair.

From your current location, go straight for 3.25 meters, then turn right 120 degrees and go another 1.5 meters. After that, turn left 30 degrees and go 5 meters to exit the room and enter the hallway, then turn left 30 degrees and go another 2.25 meters. Finally, turn left 90 degrees and go 2 meters into a new room.

From your current position, first go straight 3.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and go 4.75 meters down the stairs. Next, turn left 90 degrees and go straight 6 meters. Then turn left 150 degrees and go 3 meters. Finally, turn left 30 degrees and stop in front of the fireplace.

From your current position, turn right a quarter turn and go forward 2 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and go forward 1.75 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and go forward 4 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 1.25 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters, and finally turn right 30 degrees to stop.

From your current position, first turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 3.75 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, then go forward 2.75 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, then go forward 2 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 2 meters, then rotate clockwise 150 degrees, then go forward 0.75 meters and stop.

From the restaurant entrance, first turn right 210 degrees and go 1.25 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go 2.5 meters, next turn right 60 degrees and go 4.25 meters, and finally turn left 90 degrees and go 3 meters, stopping in front of the door.

Start by going straight 3 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and go 1.25 meters, followed by a 60-degree right turn and 2.25 meters forward; next, make a 90-degree right turn and walk 4 meters downstairs, then turn right 90 degrees again and go 4 meters; finally, turn left 60 degrees and walk 3.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees to stop in front of a dining table.

From your current position, go straight 2 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, go straight 2.25 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, go straight 0.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, go straight 1.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, go straight 0.25 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, go straight 0.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, go straight 1.25 meters, and finally turn left 90 degrees and stop.

Starting from your current position, go forward 3 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 1.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 1.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go forward 3.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and go forward 2.25 meters to go down the stairs, after that, turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 2.5 meters and stop in front of the driver's side door.

From your current position, turn right 90 degrees, then go straight 1.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go straight 5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, then go straight 2.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, then go straight 4 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go straight 2.5 meters, and finally, turn right 120 degrees and stop facing the table.

From your current location, first go straight 3.75 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, go another 3.75 meters straight, then turn right 90 degrees, proceed 3.5 meters, turn left 30 degrees, go 2.5 meters, and finally turn right 30 degrees to stop facing the computer desk.

Starting from the current position, first turn left 120 degrees, then move forward 2.25 meters. Next, turn left 60 degrees, then move forward 4.75 meters. After that, turn right 90 degrees and move forward 2 meters. Then, turn right 60 degrees and move forward 6 meters to arrive at the conference room. Finally, turn left 90 degrees and stop.

To get from one end of the meeting room to the other, first turn left 90 degrees and walk 5.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and walk 3.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and walk 1.25 meters to get around the pillar, immediately turning left 30 degrees, then walk another 3.25 meters, and finally turn right 90 degrees and walk 5 meters to stop facing the whiteboard.

From your current position, turn left 30 degrees and go 6 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and go 1.5 meters. Next, turn right 90 degrees, go 4 meters, and head upstairs. From there, turn left 60 degrees and go 1.25 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and go 1.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, and finally go 1.75 meters straight to stop facing the table and chairs.

From your current position, go forward 1.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 3.25 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and go forward 2 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 2.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and go forward 3.75 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, and finally go forward 6 meters and stop facing the sofa.

Starting from your current position, go straight 5 meters up to the second floor, then turn left 90 degrees and go 2.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 1 meter, then turn left 30 degrees and go 2.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and go 1.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 1.5 meters, and finally turn left 90 degrees and go 4.5 meters until you reach the third floor and stop.

Starting from here, go straight 3.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 3.25 meters, then turn 120 degrees clockwise and go another 2.25 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go 3 meters, stopping in front of the window.

From your current location, go through the hallway and into the first room on your left. Advance 7 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and continue for 2.5 meters. Rotate a full counter-clockwise circle, then turn left 30 degrees and go 1 meter. Next, turn right 60 degrees and proceed 1.25 meters, finally turning right 60 degrees again to stop facing the mirror.
Walk to the end of the hallway across from you. Go straight for 60 meters and stop.

From your current spot, to get to the third room on the right, you'll first go forward 10.5 meters, then turn 90 degrees right and go another 4 meters. After that, turn 180 degrees clockwise, go 8 more meters, and stop in the room directly opposite.

From your current position, go forward 3.5 meters to exit the room, then turn left 90 degrees and walk 11 meters into another room; next, turn right 90 degrees, go forward 6.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and walk 2 meters to leave that room, finally turning right 60 degrees and stopping.

From your current position, go forward 3.5 meters to exit the room, then turn left 90 degrees and walk 11 meters into another room; next, turn right 90 degrees, go forward 6.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and walk 2 meters to leave that room, finally turning right 60 degrees and stopping.

From your current position, first go straight for 2 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and go straight for 3.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and go straight for 4 meters to the dining table, then turn left 60 degrees and go straight for another 4 meters, and finally turn left 120 degrees and go straight for 3 meters to stop in front of the table.

From your current position, first go forward 2.75 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go forward 3.5 meters; next, turn right 90 degrees and go forward 2 meters, then make a half-turn clockwise and go forward another 2 meters; after that, turn right 90 degrees and go forward 2 meters, and finally, turn left 90 degrees and stop.

From your current location, first move forward 3.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then move forward 1 meter, turn left 90 degrees, then move forward 2 meters, and finally complete a full clockwise rotation before stopping.

From your current position, go straight 3.75 meters, then make a 90-degree left turn and proceed 4.25 meters; next, turn right 90 degrees and walk 2.25 meters, followed by another 90-degree right turn and 2.75 meters; finally, turn left 90 degrees, advance 4.5 meters, and stop in front of the cash register.

From your current position, go straight 3.75 meters, then make a 90-degree left turn and proceed 4.25 meters; next, turn right 90 degrees and walk 2.25 meters, followed by another 90-degree right turn and 2.75 meters; finally, turn left 90 degrees, advance 4.5 meters, and stop in front of the cash register.

From your current position, first go straight 3.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go straight 2 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go straight 4 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, then go straight 1.75 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go straight 7.5 meters, and then stop facing the cabinet.

From your current position, turn right 90 degrees and go straight for 2 meters; then turn left 120 degrees and go straight for 1.25 meters; next, turn right 30 degrees and go straight for 2.5 meters; after that, turn left 60 degrees and go straight for 2 meters; then turn left 30 degrees and go straight for another 2.5 meters; finally, turn right 60 degrees and go straight for 3.25 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and stop in front of the washing machine.

From your current position, go straight 2.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go straight 2 meters. Turn left 90 degrees again and go straight 3.5 meters. Next, turn right 30 degrees and go straight 4 meters. Then, turn right 60 degrees to face the stairs, go up 5.5 meters to the second floor, and stop.

From your current position, first go forward 2.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go forward 1.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, then go forward 2 meters down the stairs, then turn left 90 degrees, then go forward 1.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go forward 1.25 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, then go forward 1.5 meters, then turn 120 degrees counter-clockwise, and finally go forward 4 meters and stop.
Go across to the house, turn around, walk straight for 7.5 meters, then turn completely around to your left and stop.
Walk out of the room and turn right. Go straight for 3 meters and stop. Turn right 90 degrees, then go straight for 5 meters and stop. After that, turn right 180 degrees to face the other way.
Walk around the bed, go straight for 2.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, go another 2.5 meters, turn right 90 degrees again, go 2.5 meters, and stop.
Go downstairs, then go straight for 2.5 meters, turn left, go another 2.5 meters, and stop.
Walk down the hall to the room on your right at the very end; inside, go straight for six meters, turn right, and walk four more meters to the bed.
To navigate the winding corridor, first turn right 30 degrees and go 2 meters, then left 60 degrees and go 1 meter, then right 60 degrees and go 1 meter, and finally, stop.
Go around the bed. First, walk two meters straight, then turn left and walk three meters, then turn left again and walk 1.5 meters, and stop.
To make a semi-circle in the hall, go forward 2 meters, turn right 30 degrees, and repeat that 6 times. Finally, move forward 2 meters before stopping.
Walk to the door opposite. Go 9 meters straight, then turn right 30 degrees, walk another 2 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, and stop after one more meter.

Walk to the corridor entrance straight ahead, go forward 1.5 meters and turn right 30 degrees. Then, move forward 1 meter, turn left 30 degrees, move forward 3 meters, and finally, turn left 30 degrees before stopping.

Go down the hall. Walk 7.75 meters, then turn 30 degrees left and go 2 meters to get around the obstacle, then turn 30 degrees right to straighten up and go 4 meters, then turn 60 degrees left and stop.
Go forward two meters, make a ninety-degree left turn, then go another two meters, and make a ninety-degree right turn and stop.

Go straight 5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, and go 1.5 meters to get behind the first pillar up ahead.Then, turn left 60 degrees, move forward 0.5 meters, and finally, turn left 90 degrees before stopping.
Take the stairs up to the second floor. First, walk straight for two and a half meters, make a right and go one meter, then make another right and go two meters, and you'll be right there.

Starting from the current position, move forward 2 meters, then turn left half a circle. After that, turn right a quarter circle, move forward 2 meters, then move back 1.5 meters. Next, turn left 30 degrees, and move forward 2 meters. Finally, turn left 60 degrees and stop.
From here, go straight for 4 meters, then turn right and go another 2 meters, and stop next to the potted plant.

First, go two meters forward to the end of the room, then turn left; walk 0.5 meters, then turn around clockwise; go forward one meter, then turn 30 degrees to the right and go another meter; finally, turn 330 degrees counter-clockwise and stop.
From where you are, go straight for 1.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, walk another 1.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, and finally stop right in front of the stairs.

To go upstairs from where you are, first turn left 30 degrees and walk straight for 6 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, then go another 1.5 meters and make a 90-degree right turn to reach the stairs, and from there, go up 3.5 meters to the second floor.

Walk forward 2.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees and walk 2 meters. After stopping, turn left 30 degrees and walk 4 meters. After stopping, turn right 30 degrees and walk 3 meters. After stopping, turn left 30 degrees and walk 2.5 meters. Finally, turn left 180 degrees and stop.

You'll go around the room: first, move 2 meters forward, turn left 60 degrees, go another 1.25 meters, turn left 30 degrees, then move 1.5 meters forward, turn left 150 degrees, advance 3 meters, and when you get there, make one more 150-degree left turn and stop.

First, turn 120 degrees left, then head to the stairs, go 5.25 meters straight and stop, then turn completely around to your left, then halfway to your right, go another 5 meters straight, and then stop.

First, turn right 30 degrees and go 2.5 meters, then continue straight for 4.5 meters; next, turn left 150 degrees and go 4 meters; then turn right 150 degrees and go another 4 meters; finally, turn left and go 1 meter, stopping once you exit the room.

First, turn right 120 degrees, then go forward 2 meters, then turn counter-clockwise 300 degrees, then go forward 3.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go forward 3 meters, then turn left 120 degrees, go forward 2.5 meters, and stop.

First, turn left 30 degrees and go 3 meters, then turn right 150 degrees and go another 3 meters; stop there, turn left 90 degrees, and go 2 meters; then, stop again, turn right 60 degrees and go 3.5 meters, finally turning right 90 degrees and going 2 meters before stopping.

First, turn 180 degrees clockwise, move forward 2.5 meters and then stop; then, turn left 30 degrees, go 0.75 meters, and turn left 90 degrees; after that, move forward 3 meters, turn left 90 degrees, go 1.5 meters, turn left 90 degrees again, go another 3 meters, then turn left 90 degrees to stop; finally, turn left 60 degrees and stop.

First, turn right 150 degrees, then go forward 2.5 meters. After that, turn right 390 degrees and stop. Then, go forward 3 meters and back up 4 meters. Once you've stopped, turn left 120 degrees and stop again.

First, turn 360 degrees to your right, then 360 degrees to your left, then go straight for 2 meters, turn left 30 degrees, and go another 2 meters, after which you'll turn right 60 degrees, walk 1.5 meters to stop by the bed, and finally turn right 60 degrees to face it.

From the left side of the bed, go forward 1.75 meters, then turn right 90 degrees. Go another 2.25 meters, then rotate counter-clockwise 630 degrees. Next, go forward 1 meter, then turn left 60 degrees, and go forward 3 meters. Finally, turn right 60 degrees and stop.

From here, first turn left 120 degrees, then go forward 3 meters. Next, turn right 60 degrees and go another 2.75 meters. After that, turn 300 degrees counter-clockwise, move forward 2.75 meters again, and finally, back up 4 meters.

From your current position, move to a spot 2.5 meters away at a 53-degree angle to your front-right by first going straight 1.5 meters, then turning right and going 2 meters; once you're there, spin 360 degrees clockwise, then 360 degrees counter-clockwise, and then go forward 8.75 meters and stop.

First, turn left 240 degrees, then go forward 0.75 meters, next turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 1 meter, after that turn right 90 degrees and stop in front of the stairs, and then go forward 1.5 meters and stop.

First, go straight for one meter, then turn left thirty degrees, then go straight for one point two five meters, then another one point five meters, then turn right thirty degrees, then go straight for one meter, then turn left thirty degrees, then go straight for ten meters, then stop and turn left ninety degrees, and finally go straight for five point five meters and stop.

First, rotate 330 degrees clockwise, then go 4 meters forward; next, turn right 30 degrees and move 2.75 meters; then turn right 90 degrees and go 2 meters, stopping by the table; after that, turn right 150 degrees and go 3 meters, finally turning right 30 degrees and moving 1.5 meters to a complete stop.

Go forward one meter, then turn right 210 degrees. Go forward point seven five meters, then turn right 30 degrees. Go forward another point seven five meters, then turn right 150 degrees. Stop, then turn right 180 degrees, then back up two meters and stop.

First, go forward 1.75 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go forward 4 meters and immediately reverse 4 meters, then stop and turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 2 meters and immediately reverse 2 meters, then stop and turn right 60 degrees, then go forward 1 meter and immediately reverse 1 meter, and then stop.

Start by turning right 60 degrees, then walk 5 meters out of the room; next, turn left 90 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters; then, turn left 60 degrees and walk 3.5 meters; after that, stop, do a 540-degree clockwise spin, then go 2.5 meters; finally, turn left 30 degrees, walk 5 meters, and stop.

First, go forward two meters, then turn right sixty degrees, move forward point seven five meters, then turn right thirty degrees, make a 180-degree turn, then lower your head and back up four meters, turn left ninety degrees, and finally, advance one and a half meters and stop.

Go straight for 4 meters, then take a 30-degree left turn and proceed 3 meters; next, make a 90-degree right turn and go 1.25 meters, then another 30-degree right turn for 1.5 meters; after that, make a 90-degree right turn and go 2.5 meters, then a 60-degree right turn for 1 meter; then, turn left 120 degrees, immediately followed by a 30-degree right turn, and advance 0.5 meters; next, turn left 30 degrees and go 1 meter, then make a 60-degree right turn and proceed 0.75 meters; finally, take a 90-degree right turn, go 1 meter, and stop.

From your current position, turn 120 degrees clockwise, then go 1.25 meters. Then turn 390 degrees clockwise and go another 1.25 meters. Next, make a 90-degree right turn and go 0.75 meters. After that, turn 60 degrees left and go another 0.75 meters. Finally, turn 30 degrees left, go 1 meter, and then stop.
Turn right 30 degrees and go 3.5 meters straight, then turn left 30 degrees and go 2.75 meters straight, and then turn right 120 degrees, go 5 meters straight, and stop.
From here, turn right 90 degrees and go 5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and go 1.5 meters, then left 60 degrees and go 2.5 meters, make a clockwise half-turn, and finally go 8 meters and stop.
First, go 3 meters straight, then turn left 30 degrees and go 5 meters, after that turn 180 degrees to your left and go 7 meters, then turn 240 degrees clockwise, and finally go 2.5 meters and stop.

First, go straight for 9 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go straight for 2.25 meters, then turn right 60 degrees, then go back 0.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go straight for 1.5 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, then go straight for 1 meter, then turn right 60 degrees, and finally, go straight for 1.5 meters and stop.

First, turn left 150 degrees, then go forward 1.75 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 2 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go forward another 2 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and go forward 1 meter, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 1.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then turn right 180 degrees, and finally, back up 3 meters and stop.

First, go forward 2.25 meters, then turn left 60 degrees, go another 2 meters, turn left 30 degrees, then go forward 1.75 meters, turn right 30 degrees, and go 1.5 meters out the door; next, turn left 90 degrees, go forward 0.5 meters, turn left 30 degrees, go forward 5 meters, make a right 180-degree turn, and finally go another 3 meters out the door and stop.

Start by going forward 2 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go 1.25 meters; next, make a 390-degree counter-clockwise turn and go forward another 2 meters; after that, turn right 90 degrees, go 2.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees; from there, go forward 3 meters into a new room; once inside, turn left 90 degrees and go 3.5 meters; finally, turn right 90 degrees, go 2.5 meters, and stop.

First, turn right 120 degrees and go straight 1.5 meters. Then, turn left 30 degrees, go straight 4.5 meters, and head down the stairs. After that, turn right 90 degrees, go straight 1 meter, turn right 90 degrees again, and go straight 3 meters. Finally, turn left 60 degrees and go straight 5 meters. Once you stop, rotate one full circle clockwise.

First, go forward 2.5 meters, turn left 120 degrees, go forward 5 meters, turn right 30 degrees, advance 1.25 meters, turn right 30 degrees, go forward 3 meters, turn right 30 degrees, move forward 2 meters, back up 3 meters, turn left 90 degrees, and finally go forward 3.25 meters to stop facing the wall.

First, turn right 60 degrees and go forward 0.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go forward 1 meter, then turn left 60 degrees and go forward 0.5 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 2 meters to clear the sofa area, then turn right 90 degrees and go forward 2.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 5.5 meters, and finally turn right 90 degrees and go forward 6.5 meters, stopping in front of the door.

From your current spot, to reach the location 5 meters away at a 53-degree angle to your front right, first go straight for 4 meters, then make a 90-degree right turn, and then go straight for another 3 meters; once you're there, turn completely around clockwise, then move forward half a meter, make a 30-degree right turn, and finally go one and a half meters straight to enter the new room.

Starting from here, move forward 0.75 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, then move forward 8 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then move forward 2.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, then move forward 2 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, then move forward 7 meters, and finally make a half counter-clockwise turn and stop.

From your current position, first turn 270 degrees counter-clockwise and then go forward 1.75 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go forward 8 meters, then turn left 60 degrees and go forward 1 meter, then turn left 90 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees, and finally go forward 8 meters into a new room.

From your current position, first go forward 3.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go forward 1.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees, then go forward 10 meters, and then turn 180 degrees clockwise and stop.

From your current position, go forward 4 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 2.5 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and go another 2.5 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and go 4 meters, then turn right 120 degrees and go 3.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees and go 3.5 meters, then turn left 90 degrees again, and finally go 3.75 meters and stop.

From your current position, make a 180-degree right turn, then walk 2.5 meters; after that, turn right 120 degrees, walk 0.75 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, and walk another 0.75 meters; next, turn left 60 degrees, walk 1 meter, and turn left 90 degrees; finally, walk 14 meters and stop.

From your current position, first turn 180 degrees counter-clockwise, then go forward 5.25 meters, then turn left 90 degrees, then go forward 2.5 meters, then turn 180 degrees clockwise, then go forward 4 meters, then turn left 120 degrees, then go forward 3 meters, then turn right 30 degrees, then go forward 6.25 meters, and then stop.

From your current position, first go straight for 3 meters, then turn right 60 degrees and walk 0.5 meters; next, turn right 30 degrees and continue for 5.5 meters; then turn left 30 degrees and walk 1 meter; finally, turn left 60 degrees and walk 5 meters, and upon reaching that spot, turn left 120 degrees and stop facing the stairs.
First, turn 360 degrees clockwise to survey your surroundings, then advance 4 meters, turn left 60 degrees and go 1 meter, and then turn right 60 degrees and go 2.5 meters.

From your current position, go forward 0.75 meters, then turn right 30 degrees; go forward 1.5 meters until you reach the painting, stop, and rotate 210 degrees clockwise; next, turn left 30 degrees and go forward 2.5 meters; then turn right 60 degrees and go forward 1.5 meters; turn left 270 degrees and go 4.5 meters through the hallway; then turn left 30 degrees, go forward 1 meter, turn right 30 degrees, and finally, go forward 5 meters and stop in front of the door.

From your current position, go forward 6 meters, then turn right 90 degrees and walk 0.5 meters, next turn right 30 degrees and proceed 0.75 meters, then turn left 30 degrees and walk 1.25 meters, turn right 60 degrees and go 1 meter, then turn right 120 degrees and go 2 meters, next turn left 90 degrees and walk 2 meters into the room, finally turn left 90 degrees and go 1.5 meters, stopping in front of the blackboard.
